directions: Place the chipotle chile and water into a blender, and puree until smooth. Pour into a slow cooker, and add the pork, chicken, hominy, green chilies, onion, garlic, and chicken broth. Season with oregano, cumin, pepper, and the bay leaf.
Cover, and cook on Low 6 to 7 hours until the meats are tender. Remove the bay leaf before serving.
ingredients: 1 canned chipotle pepper in adobo sauce
1/2 pound skinless, boneless chicken breast halves
1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper to taste
title: Slow Cooker Posole with Pork and Chicken
